snippet.title: Johnny Depp ACCUSED Me Of CHEATING Claims Amber Heard — WOW | Defamation Trial Day 15
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp ACCUSED Me Of CHEATING Claims Amber Heard — WOW | Defamation Trial Day 15.

Amber Heard says Johnny Depp accused her of sleeping with actor Eddie Redmayne during the filming of the "Danish Girl." It doesn't add up as Johnny Depp worked with Eddie Redmayne in 2018 on "Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald," and had a great working relation with him.

Happening in court:
Day 15
Amber Heard - Testifies in Defamation Trial 

• Subscribe
https://www.youtube.com/haidertonight?sub_confirmation=1

• Thoughts
Actor Johnny Depp is suing ex-wife Amber Heard for $50 million for defamation in connection with Heard’s 2018 Washington Post op-ed, in which she spoke out about being the victim of domestic violence. Heard’s article did not specifically name Depp as her alleged abuser, but according to Depp’s lawsuit, it relied “on the central premise that Ms. Heard was a domestic abuse victim and that Mr. Depp perpetrated domestic violence against her.” Amber Heard is counter-suing Depp for $100 million. 

The defamation trial began Monday in Fairfax County Circuit Court in Virginia, with jury selection completing on the same day. There is a possibility of celebrity witnesses testifying, including James Franco and Elon Musk.
